name: Tabtweet - Tweets On New Tab
description: Add tweets you want to look at again and see one every time you open a new tab. Great for spaced repetition of tips/resources.
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' chrome-extension://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js https://cdn.usefathom.com https://cdn.usefathom.com/script.js https://platform.twitter.com https://pbs.twimg.com/ https://cdn.api.twitter.com https://syndication.twitter.com https://cdn.syndication.twimg.com https://www.gstatic.com/ https://*.firebaseio.com https://www.googleapis.com https://apis.google.com; object-src 'self'
